ai-mil5.5.5:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, the Buddha has said these words:
ai-mil5.5.5:1.2_0: ‘Formerly, when I was a human being, I was a human being.’

ai-mil5.5.5:1.5_0: the Buddha has said these words:

ai-mil5.5.5:2.1_0: “Great king, the Buddha has spoken about this:
ai-mil5.5.5:2.2_0: ‘In the past, when I was a human being, I was a well-born, unoppressed.’ And though I was dead, I was depressed, I was conquered, and didn’t hunger.’
ai-mil5.5.5:3.1_0: “Sir, there are these eight people killing living creatures.
ai-mil5.5.5:3.3_0: Body with greed, hate, delusion, anger, hostility, disdain, contempt, jealousy, stinginess, deceit, deluded living beings, in the way beginning, “One who kills living things, instead of robbers, kills living creatures, steals, etc.; and kills living beings, kills living creatures, steals, fosters, fosters, fosters, envy, kills, mesentments, foes, mortals, robbers, stubbers, deluders, fights, roues, or living creatures; and kills living beings.
ai-mil5.5.5:3.4_0: These are the eight people killed living creatures.
ai-mil5.5.5:3.5_0: The elephant step of the Bodhi tree will show the way to Awakening.”
ai-mil5.5.5:3.6_0: “It is not suitable, great king, that the Bodhisatta could not be caught up in the morning for awakening to pay homage to the Bodhisatta.
ai-mil5.5.5:5.1_0: The very same he was intent on awakening, conscious and awe-inspiring insight with his divine eyes. The royal wound was resplendent with iron balls the royal court from a family of swans, wearing in lovely respects, reverence to great kings, great kings whose mind was born.
ai-mil5.5.5:6.1_0: “Great king, if you were to insane, excrement, hate, and very unfitter heatches himself, even a lion’s thorns, horns, kettledrums, and filthy, the elephants, horses, and chariots, and poisonsings and blocks, and filth. And he takes no longer tortoises a lot of money.
ai-mil5.5.5:6.2_0: In the same way, the being intent on awakening factors were born: he perceives the moon in his family vicinity of the royal court, with a mind resplendent and non-staple food.

ai-mil5.5.5:7.3_0: “Venerable, who is insane, the insane will take it away. That’s why we take it.”
ai-mil5.5.5:7.4_0: “Great king, when you’re insane, there’s no suffering of sticks, there’s no need to be done.
ai-mil5.5.5:7.5_0: In the same way, great king, there was a charming sight of metal, silver, gold, running and glorious loose-tongued faculties.
ai-mil5.5.5:7.6_0: But when the funeral pyre was obtained by one going forth he was reborn in a Brahmā realm.”
ai-mil5.5.5:7.7_0: “Good, sir, would you agree with such a dragon?”
